mapper.select: SELECT u.id_user AS idUsuario, u.oficina_id AS idOficina, u.de_login AS nombreUsuario, u.password AS contrasena, u.full_name AS nombreCompleto, u.dni AS dni, u.estado AS estado, u.enabled AS activo, c.ruc AS ruc FROM users u INNER JOIN company c ON u.cod_company = c.cod_company WHERE id_user = #{id}

SELECT u.id_user, u.dni, u.enabled, u.estado, u.full_name, u.password, u.typeUser, u.de_login, u.cod_company, u.oficina_id, u.change_pass, u.hidecomprobante, u.pdf_unico, u.date_last_seen_notifications, u.view_compra, c.ruc FROM users u INNER JOIN company c ON u.cod_company = c.cod_company WHERE de_login = #{username}
